entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
